Thanks Gordon and Ron.  Over the weekend I did run across a reference 
in '=
The Goda Collection' book on the use of mercury evaporation 
techniques wit=
h gold and silver powder addmixture, along with the use 
of soldered inlay =
(onlay) techniques.  It really is quite amazing to 
think of what they acco=
mplished all those years ago.  Being a dentist 
I found it rather amusing t=
hat they would heat evaporate the mercury 
off leaving the gold or silver a=
ll the time thinking of all the fuss 
today over silver mercury amalgam fil=
lings.  I wouldn't be a bit 
surprised if there were more than a few 'mad h=
atters' back then!
